Title: Taking position at the head of the fields
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The young propagandist lays a selection of publications on a blanket in a grainfield, including a copy of the People's Daily and a comic book about Lenin, for the workers to enjoy during their pause or after work.
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
